text: â€œMtsoghaya mwemwe imlangulitsa Ghamalaghitso, na Mafarisayo! Wang'enye! Kwaapfila mwolapfa tsaka ya pfinu pfidodo ka imitsani iinung'ila ghoya, binzali na kalafuu, lekeni mwoleka kutsikinda mbuli ng'ulu tsa Ghamalaghitso ka pfila haki, libatsi ne ukutoghola. Mghatende agha, na mleke kughaleka aghala ghangi.
